Sepsis Risk Assesment Home Take Test
Hello blank fragment > Sepsis is a life threatening disease that stems from a body's reaction to an infection. Symptoms:
 -fever above 101 degrees farenheit
 -heart rate higher than 90 bpm
 -breathing rate higher than 20 breaths per minute
 -patches of discolored skin
 -chills due to fall in body temperature Causes
 -Recently gone through a major illness
 -Compormised immune system Using your inputs of your visible symptoms, history of infection, and measurements made through our sensors, we perform a risk assessment analysis on whether you need to take full diagnostic test of sepsis Do you have a major illness or have recently suffered through one?
